channel.title: You need ****** level
channel.description:
what i can set what level need for wear any item?
what file need open?
sorry for bad english ;(
thanks for help

item.title: You need ****** level
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

[quote=“Ben Sprinkle, post:8, topic:163649”][quote author=kesa28 link=topic=222353.msg1922354#msg1922354 date=1197239430]
but when i can do: skill cape wear for 99 lvl?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 11:32:11 AM[/size][hr]why it not work?

}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Range Cape”)) {
return 99;
}
[/quote]
try:

if(ItemName.endsWith.("Cape")) {
  return 99;
}

but then again that makes all capes require 99 of the level, also check which 99 level it’s returning, it may be returning 99 attack for a woodcutting cape or something[/quote]
Or, you could add the return in the boolean process and later define it within the get booleans.

Read full topic

item.title: You need ****** level
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

[quote=“kesa28, post:6, topic:163649”]but when i can do: skill cape wear for 99 lvl?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 11:32:11 AM[/size][hr]why it not work?

}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Range Cape”)) {
return 99;
}[/quote]
try:

if(ItemName.endsWith.("Cape")) {
  return 99;
}

but then again that makes all capes require 99 of the level, also check which 99 level it’s returning, it may be returning 99 attack for a woodcutting cape or something

item.title: You need ****** level
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Gold Lord Gold
item.description:
@Lord_Gold wrote:

I made these commands they are help full here

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("attackcape")) if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(14073, 1); addItem(13074, 1); addItem(14075, 1); sendMessage("You Get an Attack Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Attack"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("strengthcape")) if(playerLevel[2] >= 99) { addItem(14076, 1); addItem(14077, 1); addItem(14078, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Strength Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Strength"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("defencecape")) if(playerLevel[1] >= 99) { addItem(14079, 1); addItem(14080, 1); addItem(14081, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Defence Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Defence"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rangecape")) if(playerLevel[4] >= 99) { addItem(14082, 1); addItem(14083, 1); addItem(14084, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Range Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Range"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("prayercape")) if(playerLevel[5] >= 99) { addItem(14085, 1); addItem(14086, 1); addItem(14087, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Prayer Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Prayer"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("magiccape")) if(playerLevel[6] >= 99) { addItem(14088, 1); addItem(14089, 1); addItem(14090, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Magic Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Magic"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runecraftingcape")) if(playerLevel[20] >= 99) { addItem(10722, 1); addItem(10723, 1); addItem(10724, 1); sendMessage("You Get a RC Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 RCing"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hitpointscape")) if(playerLevel[3] >= 99) { addItem(14094, 1); addItem(14095, 1); addItem(14096, 1); sendMessage("You Get a HitPoints Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 HP"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("agilitycape")) if(playerLevel[16] >= 99) { addItem(14097, 1); addItem(14098, 1); addItem(14099, 1); sendMessage("You Get an Agility Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Agility"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("herblorecape")) if(playerLevel[15] >= 99) { addItem(14100, 1); addItem(14101, 1); addItem(14102, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Herblore Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Herblore"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("thievingcape")) if(playerLevel[17] >= 99) { addItem(14103, 1); addItem(14104, 1); addItem(14105, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Thieve Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Thieving"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("craftingcape")) if(playerLevel[13] >= 99) { addItem(10737, 1); addItem(10738, 1); addItem(10739, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Crafting Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Crafting"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fletchingcape")) if(playerLevel[9] >= 99) { addItem(14109, 1); addItem(14110, 1); addItem(14111, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Fletching Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Fletching"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("slayercape")) if(playerLevel[18] >= 99) { addItem(10743, 1); addItem(10744, 1); addItem(10745, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Slayer Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Slayer"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("miningcape")) if(playerLevel[14] >= 99) { addItem(14118, 1); addItem(14119, 1); addItem(14120, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Mining Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Mining"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("smithingcape")) if(playerLevel[13] >= 99) { addItem(14121, 1); addItem(14122, 1); addItem(14123, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Smithing Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Smithing"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fishingcape")) if(playerLevel[10] >= 99) { addItem(14124, 1); addItem(14125, 1); addItem(14126, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Fishing Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Fishing"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cookingcape")) if(playerLevel[7] >= 99) { addItem(14127, 1); addItem(14128, 1); addItem(14129, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Cooking Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Cooking"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("firemakingcape")) if(playerLevel[11] >= 99) { addItem(10761, 1); addItem(10762, 1); addItem(10763, 1); sendMessage("You Get a FireMaking Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 FireMaking"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("woodcuttingcape")) if(playerLevel[8] >= 99) { addItem(14133, 1); addItem(14134, 1); addItem(14135, 1); sendMessage("You Get a WoodCutting Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 WoodCutting"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("farmingcape")) if(playerLevel[19] >= 99) { addItem(10767, 1); addItem(10768, 1); addItem(10769, 1); sendMessage("You Get a Farming Cape!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Farming"); }
